Coalition talks: National agrees policy deals with Act and NZ First https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coalition-talks-nationals-nicola-willis-reaffirms-mini-budget-before-christmas/VGVPRYM2P5BBNOBCCF5ENPHQI4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coalition-talks-nationals-nicola-willis-reaffirms-mini-budget-before-christmas/VGVPRYM2P5BBNOBCCF5ENPHQI4/ Georgina CampbellBut the National Party deputy leader has emphasised the word 'mini'. Photo / Michael Craig
Whangamatā police suspend search for missing man Jordan van Deursen https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/whangamata-police-suspend-search-for-missing-man-jordan-van-deursen/S2KIOABK5ZHPPJXSIIM34S2KJA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/whangamata-police-suspend-search-for-missing-man-jordan-van-deursen/S2KIOABK5ZHPPJXSIIM34S2KJA/ Jim BirchallVan Deursen, 29, has not been seen after failing to return from a planned trip to the Went Mon, 20 Nov 2023 02:18:32 +0000 Jordan van Deursen is 29 and was reported missing after he did not return from his travel to the Wentworth Valley area on October 29.

Woman accused of killing her father in a house fire tells undercover cop: ‘Arson is the easiest thing in the world’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-accused-of-killing-her-father-in-a-house-fire-tells-undercover-cop-arson-is-the-easiest-thing-世界中/BWZTXE2UEBBJXGL6ERLAPHQ3EI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-accused-of-killing-her-father-in-a-house-fire-tells-undercover-cop-arson-is-the-easiest-thing-世界中/BWZTXE2UEBBJXGL6ERLAPHQ3EI/ Evidence shows the fire started from a pot of hot oil left on an element. Mon, 20 Nov 2023 01:47:49 +0000 Ten years after the death of 88-year-old Ronald Russell Allison in a house fire at Te Karaka, his daughter Lynne Maree Martin has gone on trial in the High Court at Gisborne charged with his murder. Photo / S. Curtis, Gisborne Herald

Digital montage / Paul Slater
Unvaccinated doctor treated patients during Covid-19 pandemic, issued bogus vaccine exemptions https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/unvaccinated-doctor-treatment-患者-during-covid-19-pandemic-issued-bogus-vaccine-exemptions/WSUO5SMCSZDG3EUXF6VD6KYRQA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/unvaccinated-doctor-treatment-患者-during-covid-19-pandemic-issued-bogus-vaccine-exemptions/WSUO5SMCSZDG3EUXF6VD6KYRQA/ Emily MoorhouseThe doctor gave out almost 300 medical certificates regarding the Covid-19 vaccine. Mon, 20 Nov 2023 01:38:43 +0000 The Health and Disability Commissioner found that a doctor, understood to be Dr Jonie Girouard, who issued patients with medical certificates implying they weren't suitable to receive the Covid-19 vaccine during the pandemic despite no evidence backing this up, was "wholly irresponsible". Photo / 123rf
